Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceData" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StackFrameCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StackFrame" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64" count="StackFrameCount"/> <data name="ModuleCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="Module" count="ModuleCount"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BaseAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SizeOfImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeDateStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Message: [Virtual machine %2] '%1' device %3 - A fatal error occured while processing a protocol message from the guest.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Device" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: [Virtual machine %2] '%1' A guest crash dump was successfully written to %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DumpFile" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: [Virtual machine %2] '%1' A guest crash dump was started but did not complete successfully.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
